projects.title: 24/7 Postal
projects.description: This app allows users to book a Private Hire vehicle from 24/7 Postal to their local with 24hr delivery service.

projects.title: Welcome To New York
projects.description: When you're travelling around and you come up to a place of interest, have you ever wanted to know more about it ? Well, if you're in New York City and walking around, now you can. When you arrive at an attraction, our app will automatically pop up and tell you a bit about it. You can even open the app, tap on a location and learn about it in advance.

projects.title: YTAUDIO
projects.description: Create and Share Music with friends & family. Your experience with music knows no bound. We promote good music and help identify talents across the world. The main feature is “Create Your Music” also known as “Voice over Instrumental.” This is the section where songs can be split into pieces. The amazing thing about splitting is the ability to uncover songs and discover the beauty of music with the recording section—Your Personal Studio.

projects.title: Hotel Booking App (UI)
projects.description: Hotel Booking App (UI) created with React Native, based on a design concept found on UpLabs, showing a bit different perspective about how the listing and detail of a booking can be displayed in a mobile app.

projects.title: It's Relevant
projects.description: This App for Android, Amazon and Apple TV boxes provides you with a direct connection to all of the benefits of a custom TV network from It's Relevant. App puts the true power of television into the hands of business owners. From local storefronts, medical offices, restaurants, and salons to sports arenas, theatres, hotels and car dealerships, the networks work uniquely for each and every location.

projects.title: AviationGear App
projects.description: The one-stop shop for the overwhelmed Snacko, Mess Officer, Booster Club, and Corporate Buyer. AviatorGear is your panic button when you need BOTOT and you need it right...the first time. We make your life easier with free design and sticking to a production timeline you can count on.

projects.title: Almondpharma
